sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(m_product.id) AS CountProd
FROM m_product
LEFT JOIN m_restaurant AS mr ON (mr.id = m_product.rest_id)
WHERE m_product.market_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.market}} */ AND m_product.category_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.cat_id}} */ AND m_product.status = :P3 /* {{1}} */ AND mr.status = :P4 /* {{1}} */ AND m_product.deleted_on IS NULL AND mr.deleted_on IS NULL

SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_GET.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT mp.id as p_id, mp.prod_id, mp.rest_id, mp.prod_mark_id, mp.prod_name_hin as prod_name, mp.prod_img1, mr.shop_name_hin as shop_name, 
(select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_id, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, 
rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price, 
coalesce((select rw.prod_id where rw.prod_id is not null),0) as count_wl,
coalesce((select rc.prod_id where rc.prod_id is not null),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review 
FROM m_product mp  
left join m_restaurant mr on (mr.id=mp.rest_id and mr.deleted_on is null) 
left join r_wishlist rw on (mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id) 
left join r_cart rc on (mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id) 
WHERE mr.status = @rest_status and mp.status = @prod_status AND mp.market_id = @market and mp.category_id = @cat_id and mp.deleted_on is null 
group by mp.id, mr.shop_name_hin, rw.prod_id, rc.prod_id ORDER by mp.id ASC limit @limit;

SELECT mp.id as p_id, mp.prod_id, mp.rest_id, mp.prod_mark_id, mp.prod_name_bn as prod_name, mp.prod_img1, mr.shop_name_bn as shop_name,

rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price,

coalesce((select rc.prod_id where rc.prod_id is not null),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review   FROM m_product mp  
left join m_restaurant mr on (mr.id=mp.rest_id and mr.deleted_on is null) 
left join r_wishlist rw on (mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id) 
left join r_cart rc on (mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id) 
WHERE mr.status = @rest_status and mp.status = @prod_status AND mp.market_id = @market and mp.category_id = @cat_id and mp.deleted_on is null group by mp.id, mr.shop_name_bn, rw.prod_id, rc.prod_id ORDER by mp.id ASC limit @limit;
